00034 //! Polynome a n variables, n <= 4<br>Implementation des coefficients a l'aide d'un DoubleTab
00035 //
00036 class Polynome : public Objet_U
00037 {
00038   Declare_instanciable(Polynome);
00039 
00040 public :
00041   inline Polynome(int n1);
00042   inline Polynome(int n1, int n2);
00043   inline Polynome(int n1, int n2, int n3);
00044   inline Polynome(int n1, int n2, int n3, int n4);
00045   inline Polynome(const DoubleTab& );
00046   inline int degre(int ) const;
00047   inline double& coeff(int n1);
00048   inline double& coeff(int n1, int n2);
00049   inline double& coeff(int n1, int n2, int n3);
00050   inline double& coeff(int n1, int n2, int n3, int n4);
00051   inline double coeff(int n1) const;
00052   inline double coeff(int n1, int n2) const;
00053   inline double coeff(int n1, int n2, int n3) const;
00054   inline double coeff(int n1, int n2, int n3, int n4) const;
00055   double operator()(double x1) const;
00056   double operator()(double x1, double x2) const;
00057   double operator()(double x1, double x2, double x3) const;
00058   double operator()(double x1, double x2, double x3, double x4) const;
00059 
00060   void derive(int =0);
00061   void integre(int =0);
00062 
00063   double derive(double x1) const;
00064   double derive(double x1, double x2) const;
00065   double derive(double x1, double x2, double x3) const;
00066   double derive(double x1, double x2, double x3, double x4) const;
00067 
00068   double integre(double x1) const;
00069   double integre(double x1, double x2) const;
00070   double integre(double x1, double x2, double x3) const;
00071   double integre(double x1, double x2, double x3, double x4) const;
00072 
00073   Polynome& operator +=(const Polynome&);
00074   Polynome& operator -=(const Polynome&);
00075   Polynome& operator *=(const Polynome&);
00076   Polynome& operator *=(double);
00077   Polynome& operator /=(double);
00078 
00079 private :
00080   DoubleTab coeff_;
00081 };

00205 //! Retourne le degre du polynome par rapport a la ieme variable
00206 /** \return int<br>
00207 Signification: degre du polynome<br>
00208 Contraintes: */
00209 inline int Polynome::degre(int i) const
00210 {
00211   return coeff_.dimension(i)-1;
00212 }
